function launchToken(string name, string symbol, string description, string imageUrl, string website, string twitter, string telegram) payable returns (uint256, address, address)

function getLaunchesPaginated(uint256 offset, uint256 limit) view returns (tuple(address tokenAddress, address curveAddress, address creator, string name, string symbol, string description, string imageUrl, string website, string twitter, string telegram, uint256 createdAt, uint256 stakedAmount)[])

function getLaunchInfo(uint256 launchId) view returns (tuple(address tokenAddress, address curveAddress, address creator, string name, string symbol, string description, string imageUrl, string website, string twitter, string telegram, uint256 createdAt, uint256 stakedAmount))
event TokenLaunched(uint256 indexed launchId, address indexed creator, address tokenAddress, address curveAddress, string name, string symbol, string description, string imageUrl)
event CreatorStaked(uint256 indexed launchId, address indexed creator, uint256 amount)
event StakeClaimed(uint256 indexed launchId, address indexed creator, uint256 amount)
